trans-unit.source: Either the current stream or <paramref name="destination" /> were closed before the <see cref="M:System.IO.Stream.CopyTo(System.IO.Stream)" /> method was called.
trans-unit.target: 在调用 <see cref="M:System.IO.Stream.CopyTo(System.IO.Stream)" /> 方法前当前流或 <paramref name="destination" /> 已关闭。

trans-unit.source: An I/O error occurred.
trans-unit.target: 出现 I/O 错误。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously reads the bytes from the current stream and writes them to another stream.
trans-unit.target: 从当前流中异步读取字节并将其写入到另一个流中。

trans-unit.source: The stream to which the contents of the current stream will be copied.
trans-unit.target: 当前流的内容将复制到的流。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously reads the bytes from the current stream and writes them to another stream.
trans-unit.target: 从当前流中异步读取字节并将其写入到另一个流中。

trans-unit.source: A task that represents the asynchronous copy operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示异步复制操作的任务。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Stream.CopyToAsync%2A> method enables you to perform resource-intensive I/O operations without blocking the main thread.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Stream.CopyToAsync%2A>方法使您能够在不阻塞主线程的情况下执行占用大量资源的 I/O 操作。

trans-unit.source: This performance consideration is particularly important in a [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] app or [!INCLUDE[desktop_appname](~/includes/desktop-appname-md.md)] app where a time-consuming stream operation can block the UI thread and make your app appear as if it is not working.
trans-unit.target: 在 [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] 应用或 [!INCLUDE[desktop_appname](~/includes/desktop-appname-md.md)] 应用中一个耗时的流操作可能阻塞 UI 线程并让您的应用看起来好像不工作时，这种性能的考虑就显得尤为重要了。

trans-unit.source: The async methods are used in conjunction with the `async` and `await` keywords in Visual Basic and C#.
trans-unit.target: 结合使用异步方法`async`和`await`Visual Basic 和 C# 中的关键字。

trans-unit.source: Copying begins at the current position in the current stream.
trans-unit.target: 复制当前流中当前位置开始。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use two <xref:System.IO.FileStream> objects to asynchronously copy the files from one directory to another.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用两个<xref:System.IO.FileStream>要以异步方式将文件从一个目录复制到另一个对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.FileStream> class derives from the <xref:System.IO.Stream> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.FileStream> 类是从 <xref:System.IO.Stream> 类派生的。

trans-unit.source: Notice that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Click> event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button> control is marked with the `async` modifier because it calls an asynchronous method
trans-unit.target: 请注意，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Button.Click>事件处理程序<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Button>控件将标有`async`修饰符因为它调用异步方法

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="destination" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="destination" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Either the current stream or the destination stream is disposed.
trans-unit.target: 当前流或目标流已释放。

trans-unit.source: The current stream does not support reading, or the destination stream does not support writing.
trans-unit.target: 当前流不支持阅读，或目标流不支持写入。

trans-unit.source: The stream to which the contents of the current stream will be copied.
trans-unit.target: 当前流的内容将复制到的流。

trans-unit.source: The size, in bytes, of the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 缓冲区的大小（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: This value must be greater than zero.
trans-unit.target: 此值必须大于零。

trans-unit.source: The default size is 81920.
trans-unit.target: 默认大小为 81920。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously reads the bytes from the current stream and writes them to another stream, using a specified buffer size.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的缓冲区大小，从当前流中异步读取字节并将其写入到另一流中。

trans-unit.source: A task that represents the asynchronous copy operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示异步复制操作的任务。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Stream.CopyToAsync%2A> method enables you to perform resource-intensive I/O operations without blocking the main thread.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Stream.CopyToAsync%2A>方法使您能够在不阻塞主线程的情况下执行占用大量资源的 I/O 操作。

trans-unit.source: This performance consideration is particularly important in a [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] app or [!INCLUDE[desktop_appname](~/includes/desktop-appname-md.md)] app where a time-consuming stream operation can block the UI thread and make your app appear as if it is not working.
trans-unit.target: 在 [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] 应用或 [!INCLUDE[desktop_appname](~/includes/desktop-appname-md.md)] 应用中一个耗时的流操作可能阻塞 UI 线程并让您的应用看起来好像不工作时，这种性能的考虑就显得尤为重要了。

trans-unit.source: The async methods are used in conjunction with the `async` and `await` keywords in Visual Basic and C#.
trans-unit.target: 结合使用异步方法`async`和`await`Visual Basic 和 C# 中的关键字。

trans-unit.source: Copying begins at the current position in the current stream.
trans-unit.target: 复制当前流中当前位置开始。

trans-unit.source: For an example of copying between two streams, see the <xref:System.IO.Stream.CopyToAsync%28System.IO.Stream%29> overload.
trans-unit.target: 两个流之间复制的示例，请参阅<xref:System.IO.Stream.CopyToAsync%28System.IO.Stream%29>重载。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="destination" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="destination" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="buffersize" /> is negative or zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="buffersize" /> 为负数或零。

trans-unit.source: Either the current stream or the destination stream is disposed.
trans-unit.target: 当前流或目标流已释放。

trans-unit.source: The current stream does not support reading, or the destination stream does not support writing.
trans-unit.target: 当前流不支持阅读，或目标流不支持写入。

trans-unit.source: The stream to which the contents of the current stream will be copied.
trans-unit.target: 当前流的内容将复制到的流。

trans-unit.source: The size, in bytes, of the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 缓冲区的大小（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: This value must be greater than zero.
trans-unit.target: 此值必须大于零。

trans-unit.source: The default size is 81920.
trans-unit.target: 默认大小为 81920。

trans-unit.source: The token to monitor for cancellation requests.
trans-unit.target: 要监视取消请求的标记。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="P:System.Threading.CancellationToken.None" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="P:System.Threading.CancellationToken.None" />。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously reads the bytes from the current stream and writes them to another stream, using a specified buffer size and cancellation token.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的缓冲区大小和取消令牌，从当前流中异步读取字节并将其写入到另一个流中。

trans-unit.source: A task that represents the asynchronous copy operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示异步复制操作的任务。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Stream.CopyToAsync%2A> method enables you to perform resource-intensive I/O operations without blocking the main thread.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Stream.CopyToAsync%2A>方法使您能够在不阻塞主线程的情况下执行占用大量资源的 I/O 操作。

trans-unit.source: This performance consideration is particularly important in a [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] app or [!INCLUDE[desktop_appname](~/includes/desktop-appname-md.md)] app where a time-consuming stream operation can block the UI thread and make your app appear as if it is not working.
trans-unit.target: 在 [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] 应用或 [!INCLUDE[desktop_appname](~/includes/desktop-appname-md.md)] 应用中一个耗时的流操作可能阻塞 UI 线程并让您的应用看起来好像不工作时，这种性能的考虑就显得尤为重要了。

trans-unit.source: The async methods are used in conjunction with the `async` and `await` keywords in Visual Basic and C#.
trans-unit.target: 结合使用异步方法`async`和`await`Visual Basic 和 C# 中的关键字。

trans-unit.source: If the operation is canceled before it completes, the returned task contains the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled> value for the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Status%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果在完成之前，将取消该操作，返回的任务包含<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled>值<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Status%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Copying begins at the current position in the current stream.
trans-unit.target: 复制当前流中当前位置开始。

trans-unit.source: For an example of copying between two streams, see the <xref:System.IO.Stream.CopyToAsync%28System.IO.Stream%29> overload.
trans-unit.target: 两个流之间复制的示例，请参阅<xref:System.IO.Stream.CopyToAsync%28System.IO.Stream%29>重载。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="destination" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="destination" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="buffersize" /> is negative or zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="buffersize" /> 为负数或零。

trans-unit.source: Either the current stream or the destination stream is disposed.
trans-unit.target: 当前流或目标流已释放。

trans-unit.source: The current stream does not support reading, or the destination stream does not support writing.
trans-unit.target: 当前流不支持阅读，或目标流不支持写入。

trans-unit.source: Allocates a <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitHandle" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 分配 <see cref="T:System.Threading.WaitHandle" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the allocated <see langword="WaitHandle" />.
trans-unit.target: 对已分配的 <see langword="WaitHandle" /> 的引用。

trans-unit.source: When called for the first time, the current method creates a `WaitHandle` object and returns it.
trans-unit.target: 当对第一次调用，当前方法将创建`WaitHandle`对象并将其返回。

trans-unit.source: On subsequent calls, `CreateWaitHandle` returns a reference to a new wait handle.
trans-unit.target: 在后续调用中，`CreateWaitHandle`返回到新的等待句柄的引用。

trans-unit.source: Use this method if you implement the asynchronous methods and require a way of blocking in <xref:System.IO.Stream.EndRead%2A> or <xref:System.IO.Stream.EndWrite%2A> until the asynchronous operation is complete.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法，如果你实现异步方法，并且需要一种方法中进行阻止<xref:System.IO.Stream.EndRead%2A>或<xref:System.IO.Stream.EndWrite%2A>直到异步操作已完成。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 释放由 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 对象使用的所有资源。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.
trans-unit.target: 释放由 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 使用的所有资源。

trans-unit.source: This method disposes the stream, by writing any changes to the backing store and closing the stream to release resources.
trans-unit.target: 此方法释放流中，通过写入后备存储的任何更改并关闭流，以释放资源。

trans-unit.source: Calling `Dispose` allows the resources used by the <xref:System.IO.Stream> to be reallocated for other purposes.
trans-unit.target: 调用`Dispose`允许使用的资源<xref:System.IO.Stream>可以重新分配用于其他目的。

trans-unit.source: For more information about `Dispose`, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息`Dispose`，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。

trans-unit.source: Place all cleanup logic for your stream object in <see cref="M:System.IO.Stream.Dispose(System.Boolean)" />.
trans-unit.target: 将你的流对象中的所有清理逻辑<see cref="M:System.IO.Stream.Dispose(System.Boolean)" />。

trans-unit.source: Do not override <see cref="M:System.IO.Stream.Close" />.
trans-unit.target: 不会重写<see cref="M:System.IO.Stream.Close" />。

trans-unit.source: Note that because of backward compatibility requirements, this method's implementation differs from the recommended guidance for the Dispose pattern.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，由于向后兼容性要求，此方法的实现不同于推荐的指导的释放模式。

trans-unit.source: This method calls <see cref="M:System.IO.Stream.Close" />, which then calls <see cref="M:System.IO.Stream.Dispose(System.Boolean)" />.
trans-unit.target: 此方法调用<see cref="M:System.IO.Stream.Close" />，后者随后调用<see cref="M:System.IO.Stream.Dispose(System.Boolean)" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 <see langword="true" />；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 释放由 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

trans-unit.source: You should release all resources by specifying `true` for `disposing`.
trans-unit.target: 你应通过指定释放所有资源`true`为`disposing`。

trans-unit.source: When `disposing` is `true`, the stream can also ensure data is flushed to the underlying buffer, and access other finalizable objects.
trans-unit.target: 当`disposing`是`true`，流还可确保数据刷新到基础的缓冲区，并访问其他可终结的对象。

trans-unit.source: This may not be possible when called from a finalizer due a lack of ordering among finalizers.
trans-unit.target: 这不可能从由于缺乏终结器之间的排序终结器中调用时。

trans-unit.source: If your stream is using an operating system handle to communicate with its source, consider using a subclass of <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.SafeHandle> for this purpose.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的流使用操作系统句柄来与其源进行通信，请考虑使用的一个子类<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.SafeHandle>为此目的。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A> method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法称为由公共<xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A> invokes the protected <xref:System.IO.Stream.Dispose%2A> method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A> 调用受保护<xref:System.IO.Stream.Dispose%2A>方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes <xref:System.IO.Stream.Dispose%2A> with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> 调用<xref:System.IO.Stream.Dispose%2A>与`disposing`设置为`false`。

trans-unit.source: In derived classes, do not override the <see cref="M:System.IO.Stream.Close" /> method, instead, put all of the Stream cleanup logic in the <see cref="M:System.IO.Stream.Dispose(System.Boolean)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 在派生类中，不会重写<see cref="M:System.IO.Stream.Close" />方法，而是将所有中的流清理逻辑放<see cref="M:System.IO.Stream.Dispose(System.Boolean)" />方法。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose" /> 可以由其他对象多次调用。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.IO.Stream.Dispose(System.Boolean)" />, be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: 重写 <see cref="M:System.IO.Stream.Dispose(System.Boolean)" /> 时，请注意不要引用在以前调用 <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose" /> 时已释放的对象。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see cref="M:System.IO.Stream.Dispose(System.Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何实现详细信息<see cref="M:System.IO.Stream.Dispose(System.Boolean)" />，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息<see cref="M:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose" />和<see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。

trans-unit.source: The reference to the pending asynchronous request to finish.
trans-unit.target: 对要完成的挂起异步请求的引用。

trans-unit.source: Waits for the pending asynchronous read to complete.
trans-unit.target: 等待挂起的异步读取完成。

trans-unit.source: (Consider using <see cref="M:System.IO.Stream.ReadAsync(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)" /> instead.)
trans-unit.target: （请考虑改用 <see cref="M:System.IO.Stream.ReadAsync(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)" />。）

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes read from the stream, between zero (0) and the number of bytes you requested.
trans-unit.target: 从流中读取的字节数，介于零 (0) 和所请求的字节数之间。

trans-unit.source: Streams return zero (0) only at the end of the stream, otherwise, they should block until at least one byte is available.
trans-unit.target: 流仅在流结尾返回零 (0)，否则在至少有 1 个字节可用之前应一直进行阻止。

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework 4 and earlier versions, you have to use methods such as <xref:System.IO.Stream.BeginRead%2A> and <xref:System.IO.Stream.EndRead%2A> to implement asynchronous I/O operations.
trans-unit.target: 在 .NET Framework 4 和更早的版本中，您必须使用 <xref:System.IO.Stream.BeginRead%2A> 和 <xref:System.IO.Stream.EndRead%2A> 之类的方法来实现异步 I/O 操作。

trans-unit.source: These methods are still available in the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] to support legacy code; however, the new async methods, such as <xref:System.IO.Stream.ReadAsync%2A>, <xref:System.IO.Stream.WriteAsync%2A>, <xref:System.IO.Stream.CopyToAsync%2A>, and <xref:System.IO.Stream.FlushAsync%2A>, help you implement asynchronous I/O operations more easily.
trans-unit.target: 这些方法是在中仍然可用[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]以支持旧版代码; 但是，新的异步方法，如<xref:System.IO.Stream.ReadAsync%2A>， <xref:System.IO.Stream.WriteAsync%2A>， <xref:System.IO.Stream.CopyToAsync%2A>，和<xref:System.IO.Stream.FlushAsync%2A>，帮助你更轻松地实现异步 I/O 操作。

trans-unit.source: Call `EndRead` to determine how many bytes were read from the stream.
trans-unit.target: 调用`EndRead`以确定已从流中读取的字节数。

trans-unit.source: `EndRead` can be called once on every <xref:System.IAsyncResult> from <xref:System.IO.Stream.BeginRead%2A>.
trans-unit.target: `EndRead` 可以在上一次调用每个<xref:System.IAsyncResult>从<xref:System.IO.Stream.BeginRead%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This method blocks until the I/O operation has completed.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将一直阻塞，直到 I/O 操作已完成。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A handle to the pending read operation is not available.
trans-unit.target: 处于挂起状态的读取操作的句柄不可用。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The pending operation does not support reading.
trans-unit.target: 挂起操作不支持读取。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> did not originate from a <see cref="M:System.IO.Stream.BeginRead(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> method on the current stream.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> 不是源自当前流的 <see cref="M:System.IO.Stream.BeginRead(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The stream is closed or an internal error has occurred.
trans-unit.target: 流已关闭或出现了内部错误。

trans-unit.source: A reference to the outstanding asynchronous I/O request.
trans-unit.target: 对未完成的异步 I/O 请求的引用。

trans-unit.source: Ends an asynchronous write operation.
trans-unit.target: 结束异步写操作。

trans-unit.source: (Consider using <see cref="M:System.IO.Stream.WriteAsync(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)" /> instead.)
trans-unit.target: （请考虑改用 <see cref="M:System.IO.Stream.WriteAsync(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)" />。）

trans-unit.source: In the .NET Framework 4 and earlier versions, you have to use methods such as <xref:System.IO.Stream.BeginWrite%2A> and <xref:System.IO.Stream.EndWrite%2A> to implement asynchronous I/O operations.
trans-unit.target: 在 .NET Framework 4 和更早的版本中，您必须使用 <xref:System.IO.Stream.BeginWrite%2A> 和 <xref:System.IO.Stream.EndWrite%2A> 之类的方法来实现异步 I/O 操作。

trans-unit.source: These methods are still available in the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)] to support legacy code; however, the new async methods, such as <xref:System.IO.Stream.ReadAsync%2A>, <xref:System.IO.Stream.WriteAsync%2A>, <xref:System.IO.Stream.CopyToAsync%2A>, and <xref:System.IO.Stream.FlushAsync%2A>, help you implement asynchronous I/O operations more easily.
trans-unit.target: 这些方法是在中仍然可用[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]以支持旧版代码; 但是，新的异步方法，如<xref:System.IO.Stream.ReadAsync%2A>， <xref:System.IO.Stream.WriteAsync%2A>， <xref:System.IO.Stream.CopyToAsync%2A>，和<xref:System.IO.Stream.FlushAsync%2A>，帮助你更轻松地实现异步 I/O 操作。

trans-unit.source: `EndWrite` must be called exactly once on every <xref:System.IAsyncResult> from <xref:System.IO.Stream.BeginWrite%2A>.
trans-unit.target: `EndWrite` 必须在上一次调用每个<xref:System.IAsyncResult>从<xref:System.IO.Stream.BeginWrite%2A>。

trans-unit.source: This method blocks until the I/O operation has completed.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将一直阻塞，直到 I/O 操作已完成。

trans-unit.source: Errors that occur during an asynchronous write request, such as a disk failure during the I/O request, occur on the thread pool thread and become visible upon a call to `EndWrite`.
trans-unit.target: 异步写入请求，例如，I/O 请求过程的磁盘故障过程中发生的错误发生在线程池线程和调用时变得可见`EndWrite`。

trans-unit.source: Exceptions thrown by the thread pool thread will not be visible when calling `EndWrite`.
trans-unit.target: 由线程池线程引发的异常时调用将无法看到`EndWrite`。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: A handle to the pending write operation is not available.
trans-unit.target: 处于挂起状态的写入操作的句柄不可用。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The pending operation does not support writing.
trans-unit.target: 挂起操作不支持写入。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> did not originate from a <see cref="M:System.IO.Stream.BeginWrite(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> method on the current stream.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="asyncResult" /> 不是源自当前流的 <see cref="M:System.IO.Stream.BeginWrite(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32,System.AsyncCallback,System.Object)" /> 方法。

trans-unit.source: The stream is closed or an internal error has occurred.
trans-unit.target: 流已关闭或出现了内部错误。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, clears all buffers for this stream and causes any buffered data to be written to the underlying device.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写时，将清除该流的所有缓冲区，并使得所有缓冲数据被写入到基础设备。

trans-unit.source: Override `Flush` on streams that implement a buffer.
trans-unit.target: 重写`Flush`上实现缓冲区的流。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to move any information from an underlying buffer to its destination, clear the buffer, or both.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法将任何信息从基础缓冲区移动到其目标、 清除和 / 或缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: Depending upon the state of the object, you might have to modify the current position within the stream (for example, if the underlying stream supports seeking).
trans-unit.target: 根据对象的状态，你可能需要修改流中的当前位置 （例如，如果在基础流支持查找）。

trans-unit.source: For additional information see <xref:System.IO.Stream.CanSeek%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关其他信息，请参见 <xref:System.IO.Stream.CanSeek%2A>。

trans-unit.source: When using the <xref:System.IO.StreamWriter> or <xref:System.IO.BinaryWriter> class, do not flush the base <xref:System.IO.Stream> object.
trans-unit.target: 使用时<xref:System.IO.StreamWriter>或<xref:System.IO.BinaryWriter>类中，不刷新基<xref:System.IO.Stream>对象。

trans-unit.source: Instead, use the class's <xref:System.IO.Stream.Flush%2A> or <xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A> method, which makes sure that the data is flushed to the underlying stream first and then written to the file.
trans-unit.target: 请改用类的<xref:System.IO.Stream.Flush%2A>或<xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A>方法，可确保数据是第一次刷新到基础流，然后写入到文件。

trans-unit.source: An I/O error occurs.
trans-unit.target: 出现 I/O 错误。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously clears all buffers for this stream and causes any buffered data to be written to the underlying device.
trans-unit.target: 异步清除此流的所有缓冲区并导致所有缓冲数据都写入基础设备中。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously clears all buffers for this stream and causes any buffered data to be written to the underlying device.
trans-unit.target: 异步清除此流的所有缓冲区并导致所有缓冲数据都写入基础设备中。

trans-unit.source: A task that represents the asynchronous flush operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示异步刷新操作的任务。

trans-unit.source: If a derived class, such as <xref:System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream> or <xref:System.IO.Compression.GZipStream>, does not flush the buffer in its implementation of the <xref:System.IO.Stream.Flush%2A> method, the <xref:System.IO.Stream.FlushAsync%2A> method will not flush the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 如果派生的类，如<xref:System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream>或<xref:System.IO.Compression.GZipStream>，不要将它刷新的缓冲区在其实现<xref:System.IO.Stream.Flush%2A>方法，<xref:System.IO.Stream.FlushAsync%2A>方法时不会刷新缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: The stream has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 已释放流。

trans-unit.source: The token to monitor for cancellation requests.
trans-unit.target: 要监视取消请求的标记。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="P:System.Threading.CancellationToken.None" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="P:System.Threading.CancellationToken.None" />。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously clears all buffers for this stream, causes any buffered data to be written to the underlying device, and monitors cancellation requests.
trans-unit.target: 异步清理这个流的所有缓冲区，并使所有缓冲数据写入基础设备，并且监控取消请求。

trans-unit.source: A task that represents the asynchronous flush operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示异步刷新操作的任务。

trans-unit.source: If the operation is canceled before it completes, the returned task contains the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled> value for the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Status%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果在完成之前，将取消该操作，返回的任务包含<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled>值<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Status%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: If a derived class, such as <xref:System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream> or <xref:System.IO.Compression.GZipStream>, does not flush the buffer in its implementation of the <xref:System.IO.Stream.Flush%2A> method, the <xref:System.IO.Stream.FlushAsync%2A> method will not flush the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 如果派生的类，如<xref:System.IO.Compression.DeflateStream>或<xref:System.IO.Compression.GZipStream>，不要将它刷新的缓冲区在其实现<xref:System.IO.Stream.Flush%2A>方法，<xref:System.IO.Stream.FlushAsync%2A>方法时不会刷新缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: The stream has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 已释放流。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the length in bytes of the stream.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写时，获取流长度（以字节为单位）。

trans-unit.source: A long value representing the length of the stream in bytes.
trans-unit.target: 表示流长度（以字节为单位）的长值。

trans-unit.source: A class derived from <see langword="Stream" /> does not support seeking.
trans-unit.target: 从 <see langword="Stream" /> 派生的类不支持查找。

trans-unit.source: Methods were called after the stream was closed.
trans-unit.target: 在流关闭后调用方法。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="Stream" /> with no backing store.
trans-unit.target: 无后备存储区的 <see langword="Stream" />。

trans-unit.source: Use `Null` to redirect output to a stream that will not consume any operating system resources.
trans-unit.target: 使用`Null`输出重定向到一个流，它将不占用任何操作系统资源。

trans-unit.source: When the methods of `Stream` that provide writing are invoked on `Null`, the call simply returns, and no data is written.
trans-unit.target: 时的方法`Stream`提供写入调用在`Null`，只是返回调用，并且会不写入任何数据。

trans-unit.source: `Null` also implements a `Read` method that returns zero without reading data.
trans-unit.target: `Null` 此外实现`Read`返回零，而无需读取数据的方法。

trans-unit.source: Provides support for a <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Contracts.Contract" />.
trans-unit.target: 提供对 <see cref="T:System.Diagnostics.Contracts.Contract" /> 的支持。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets the position within the current stream.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写时，获取或设置当前流中的位置。

trans-unit.source: The current position within the stream.
trans-unit.target: 流中的当前位置。

trans-unit.source: The stream must support seeking to get or set the position.
trans-unit.target: 流必须支持查找要获取或设置位置。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IO.Stream.CanSeek%2A> property to determine whether the stream supports seeking.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IO.Stream.CanSeek%2A>属性以确定流是否支持查找。

trans-unit.source: Seeking to any location beyond the length of the stream is supported.
trans-unit.target: 支持查找到流的长度超出任何位置。

trans-unit.source: The `Position` property does not keep track of the number of bytes from the stream that have been consumed, skipped, or both.
trans-unit.target: `Position`属性不会不跟踪的从和 / 或已用完，跳过，流的字节数。

trans-unit.source: An I/O error occurs.
trans-unit.target: 出现 I/O 错误。

trans-unit.source: The stream does not support seeking.
trans-unit.target: 流不支持查找。

trans-unit.source: Methods were called after the stream was closed.
trans-unit.target: 在流关闭后调用方法。

trans-unit.source: An array of bytes.
trans-unit.target: 字节数组。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, the buffer contains the specified byte array with the values between <c>offset</c> and (<c>offset</c> + <c>count</c> - 1) replaced by the bytes read from the current source.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回时，该缓冲区包含指定的字节数组，该数组的 <c>offset</c> 和 (<c>offset</c> + <c>count</c> - 1) 之间的值由从当前源中读取的字节替换。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based byte offset in <c>buffer</c> at which to begin storing the data read from the current stream.
trans-unit.target: <c>buffer</c> 中从零开始的字节偏移量，从此处开始存储从当前流中读取的数据。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of bytes to be read from the current stream.
trans-unit.target: 要从当前流中最多读取的字节数。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, reads a sequence of bytes from the current stream and advances the position within the stream by the number of bytes read.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写时，从当前流读取字节序列，并将此流中的位置提升读取的字节数。

trans-unit.source: The total number of bytes read into the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 读入缓冲区中的总字节数。

trans-unit.source: This can be less than the number of bytes requested if that many bytes are not currently available, or zero (0) if the end of the stream has been reached.
trans-unit.target: 如果很多字节当前不可用，则总字节数可能小于请求的字节数；如果已到达流结尾，则为零 (0)。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IO.Stream.CanRead%2A> property to determine whether the current instance supports reading.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IO.Stream.CanRead%2A>属性来确定当前实例是否支持读取。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IO.Stream.ReadAsync%2A> method to read asynchronously from the current stream.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IO.Stream.ReadAsync%2A>方法从当前流异步读取。

trans-unit.source: Implementations of this method read a maximum of `count` bytes from the current stream and store them in `buffer` beginning at `offset`.
trans-unit.target: 此方法的实现读取的最多`count`字节从当前流，并且将它们存储在`buffer`开始`offset`。

trans-unit.source: The current position within the stream is advanced by the number of bytes read; however, if an exception occurs, the current position within the stream remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 流中的当前位置高级通过读取; 的字节数但是，如果发生异常，将流中的当前位置保持不变。

trans-unit.source: Implementations return the number of bytes read.
trans-unit.target: 实现可返回读取的字节数。

trans-unit.source: The implementation will block until at least one byte of data can be read, in the event that no data is available.
trans-unit.target: 实现将一直阻止到至少一个字节的数据可供读取的事件中不会提供数据。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.Stream.Read%2A> returns 0 only when there is no more data in the stream and no more is expected (such as a closed socket or end of file).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Stream.Read%2A> 仅当没有更多数据在流中并且没有更多预期 （如套接字已关闭或文件结尾），则返回 0。

trans-unit.source: An implementation is free to return fewer bytes than requested even if the end of the stream has not been reached.
trans-unit.target: 实现可以自由地返回少于所请求的字节，即使尚未达到流结尾。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.IO.BinaryReader> for reading primitive data types.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IO.BinaryReader>读取基元数据类型。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to use <xref:System.IO.Stream.Read%2A> to read a block of data.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.IO.Stream.Read%2A>读取的数据块。

trans-unit.source: The sum of <paramref name="offset" /> and <paramref name="count" /> is larger than the buffer length.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 和 <paramref name="count" /> 的总和大于缓冲区长度。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="buffer" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="buffer" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="offset" /> or <paramref name="count" /> is negative.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 或 <paramref name="count" /> 为负数。

trans-unit.source: An I/O error occurs.
trans-unit.target: 出现 I/O 错误。

trans-unit.source: The stream does not support reading.
trans-unit.target: 流不支持读取。

trans-unit.source: Methods were called after the stream was closed.
trans-unit.target: 在流关闭后调用方法。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously reads a sequence of bytes from the current stream and advances the position within the stream by the number of bytes read.
trans-unit.target: 从当前流异步读取字节序列，并将流中的位置提升读取的字节数。

trans-unit.source: The buffer to write the data into.
trans-unit.target: 数据写入的缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: The byte offset in <c>buffer</c> at which to begin writing data from the stream.
trans-unit.target: <c>buffer</c> 中的字节偏移量，从该偏移量开始写入流中的数据。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of bytes to read.
trans-unit.target: 最多读取的字节数。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously reads a sequence of bytes from the current stream and advances the position within the stream by the number of bytes read.
trans-unit.target: 从当前流异步读取字节序列，并将流中的位置提升读取的字节数。

trans-unit.source: A task that represents the asynchronous read operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示异步读取操作的任务。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <paramref name="TResult" /> parameter contains the total number of bytes read into the buffer.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="TResult" /> 参数的值包含读入缓冲区的总字节数。

trans-unit.source: The result value can be less than the number of bytes requested if the number of bytes currently available is less than the requested number, or it can be 0 (zero) if the end of the stream has been reached.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前可用字节数少于所请求的字节数，则该结果值可小于所请求的字节数；如果已到达流结尾时，则为 0（零）。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Stream.ReadAsync%2A> method enables you to perform resource-intensive I/O operations without blocking the main thread.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Stream.ReadAsync%2A>方法使您能够在不阻塞主线程的情况下执行占用大量资源的 I/O 操作。

trans-unit.source: This performance consideration is particularly important in a [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] app or [!INCLUDE[desktop_appname](~/includes/desktop-appname-md.md)] app where a time-consuming stream operation can block the UI thread and make your app appear as if it is not working.
trans-unit.target: 在 [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] 应用或 [!INCLUDE[desktop_appname](~/includes/desktop-appname-md.md)] 应用中一个耗时的流操作可能阻塞 UI 线程并让您的应用看起来好像不工作时，这种性能的考虑就显得尤为重要了。

trans-unit.source: The async methods are used in conjunction with the `async` and `await` keywords in Visual Basic and C#.
trans-unit.target: 结合使用异步方法`async`和`await`Visual Basic 和 C# 中的关键字。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IO.Stream.CanRead%2A> property to determine whether the current instance supports reading.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IO.Stream.CanRead%2A>属性来确定当前实例是否支持读取。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to read from a file asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何以异步方式从文件读取。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.IO.FileStream> class, which derives from the <xref:System.IO.Stream> class.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用<xref:System.IO.FileStream>类，该类派生自<xref:System.IO.Stream>类。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="buffer" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="buffer" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="offset" /> or <paramref name="count" /> is negative.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 或 <paramref name="count" /> 为负数。

trans-unit.source: The sum of <paramref name="offset" /> and <paramref name="count" /> is larger than the buffer length.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 和 <paramref name="count" /> 的总和大于缓冲区长度。

trans-unit.source: The stream does not support reading.
trans-unit.target: 流不支持读取。

trans-unit.source: The stream has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 已释放流。

trans-unit.source: The stream is currently in use by a previous read operation.
trans-unit.target: 之前的读取操作当前正在使用流。

trans-unit.source: The buffer to write the data into.
trans-unit.target: 数据写入的缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: The byte offset in <c>buffer</c> at which to begin writing data from the stream.
trans-unit.target: <c>buffer</c> 中的字节偏移量，从该偏移量开始写入流中的数据。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of bytes to read.
trans-unit.target: 最多读取的字节数。

trans-unit.source: The token to monitor for cancellation requests.
trans-unit.target: 要监视取消请求的标记。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="P:System.Threading.CancellationToken.None" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="P:System.Threading.CancellationToken.None" />。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously reads a sequence of bytes from the current stream, advances the position within the stream by the number of bytes read, and monitors cancellation requests.
trans-unit.target: 从当前流异步读取字节的序列，将流中的位置提升读取的字节数，并监视取消请求。

trans-unit.source: A task that represents the asynchronous read operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示异步读取操作的任务。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <paramref name="TResult" /> parameter contains the total number of bytes read into the buffer.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="TResult" /> 参数的值包含读入缓冲区的总字节数。

trans-unit.source: The result value can be less than the number of bytes requested if the number of bytes currently available is less than the requested number, or it can be 0 (zero) if the end of the stream has been reached.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前可用字节数少于所请求的字节数，则该结果值可小于所请求的字节数；如果已到达流结尾时，则为 0（零）。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Stream.ReadAsync%2A> method enables you to perform resource-intensive I/O operations without blocking the main thread.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Stream.ReadAsync%2A>方法使您能够在不阻塞主线程的情况下执行占用大量资源的 I/O 操作。

trans-unit.source: This performance consideration is particularly important in a [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] app or [!INCLUDE[desktop_appname](~/includes/desktop-appname-md.md)] app where a time-consuming stream operation can block the UI thread and make your app appear as if it is not working.
trans-unit.target: 在 [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] 应用或 [!INCLUDE[desktop_appname](~/includes/desktop-appname-md.md)] 应用中一个耗时的流操作可能阻塞 UI 线程并让您的应用看起来好像不工作时，这种性能的考虑就显得尤为重要了。

trans-unit.source: The async methods are used in conjunction with the `async` and `await` keywords in Visual Basic and C#.
trans-unit.target: 结合使用异步方法`async`和`await`Visual Basic 和 C# 中的关键字。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IO.Stream.CanRead%2A> property to determine whether the current instance supports reading.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IO.Stream.CanRead%2A>属性来确定当前实例是否支持读取。

trans-unit.source: If the operation is canceled before it completes, the returned task contains the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled> value for the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Status%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果在完成之前，将取消该操作，返回的任务包含<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled>值<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Status%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: For an example, see the <xref:System.IO.Stream.ReadAsync%28System.Byte%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29> overload.
trans-unit.target: 有关示例，请参阅<xref:System.IO.Stream.ReadAsync%28System.Byte%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>重载。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="buffer" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="buffer" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="offset" /> or <paramref name="count" /> is negative.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 或 <paramref name="count" /> 为负数。

trans-unit.source: The sum of <paramref name="offset" /> and <paramref name="count" /> is larger than the buffer length.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 和 <paramref name="count" /> 的总和大于缓冲区长度。

trans-unit.source: The stream does not support reading.
trans-unit.target: 流不支持读取。

trans-unit.source: The stream has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 已释放流。

trans-unit.source: The stream is currently in use by a previous read operation.
trans-unit.target: 之前的读取操作当前正在使用流。

trans-unit.source: Reads a byte from the stream and advances the position within the stream by one byte, or returns -1 if at the end of the stream.
trans-unit.target: 从流中读取一个字节，并将流内的位置向前提升一个字节，或者如果已到达流结尾，则返回 -1。

trans-unit.source: The unsigned byte cast to an <see langword="Int32" />, or -1 if at the end of the stream.
trans-unit.target: 强制转换为 <see langword="Int32" /> 的无符号字节，如果到达流的末尾，则为 -1。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IO.Stream.CanRead%2A> property to determine whether the current instance supports reading.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IO.Stream.CanRead%2A>属性来确定当前实例是否支持读取。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to manipulate the stream after the stream has been closed could throw an <xref:System.ObjectDisposedException>.
trans-unit.target: 尝试操作流已关闭流后可能会引发<xref:System.ObjectDisposedException>。

trans-unit.source: The stream does not support reading.
trans-unit.target: 流不支持读取。

trans-unit.source: Methods were called after the stream was closed.
trans-unit.target: 在流关闭后调用方法。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation on <see langword="Stream" /> creates a new single-byte array and then calls <see cref="M:System.IO.Stream.Read(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)" />.
trans-unit.target: 上的默认实现<see langword="Stream" />创建一个新的单字节数组，然后调用<see cref="M:System.IO.Stream.Read(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)" />。

trans-unit.source: While this is formally correct, it is inefficient.
trans-unit.target: 虽然这是正式正确的效率低。

trans-unit.source: Any stream with an internal buffer should override this method and provide a much more efficient version that reads the buffer directly, avoiding the extra array allocation on every call.
trans-unit.target: 所有具有内部缓冲区的流应重写此方法，并提供一个要高效得多的读取缓冲区直接，避免额外的数组分配每次调用的版本。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value, in miliseconds, that determines how long the stream will attempt to read before timing out.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值（以毫秒为单位），该值确定流在超时前尝试读取多长时间。

trans-unit.source: A value, in miliseconds, that determines how long the stream will attempt to read before timing out.
trans-unit.target: 一个确定流在超时前尝试读取多长时间的值（以毫秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.IO.Stream.ReadTimeout" /> method always throws an <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.IO.Stream.ReadTimeout" /> 方法总是引发 <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.IO.Stream.ReadTimeout" /> property should be overridden to provide the appropriate behavior for the stream.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.IO.Stream.ReadTimeout" />应重写属性，以便为流提供的适当行为。

trans-unit.source: If the stream does not support timing out, this property should raise an <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" />.
trans-unit.target: 流不支持超时，如果此属性应引发<see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" />。

trans-unit.source: A byte offset relative to the <c>origin</c> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 相对于 <c>origin</c> 参数的字节偏移量。

trans-unit.source: A value of type <see cref="T:System.IO.SeekOrigin" /> indicating the reference point used to obtain the new position.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.IO.SeekOrigin" /> 类型的值，指示用于获取新位置的参考点。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, sets the position within the current stream.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写时，设置当前流中的位置。

trans-unit.source: The new position within the current stream.
trans-unit.target: 当前流中的新位置。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IO.Stream.CanSeek%2A> property to determine whether the current instance supports seeking.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IO.Stream.CanSeek%2A>属性来确定当前实例是否支持查找。

trans-unit.source: If `offset` is negative, the new position is required to precede the position specified by `origin` by the number of bytes specified by `offset`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`offset`为负，则要求新位置指定的位置之前`origin`按指定的字节数`offset`。

trans-unit.source: If `offset` is zero (0), the new position is required to be the position specified by `origin`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`offset`是零 (0)，需要为指定的位置的新位置`origin`。

trans-unit.source: If `offset` is positive, the new position is required to follow the position specified by `origin` by the number of bytes specified by `offset`.
trans-unit.target: 如果`offset`为正，则要求按照指定的位置新位置位于`origin`按指定的字节数`offset`。

trans-unit.source: Classes derived from `Stream` that support seeking must override this method to provide the functionality described above.
trans-unit.target: 类派生自`Stream`支持查找必须重写该方法以提供上面所述的功能。

trans-unit.source: Seeking to any location beyond the length of the stream is supported.
trans-unit.target: 支持查找到流的长度超出任何位置。

trans-unit.source: An I/O error occurs.
trans-unit.target: 出现 I/O 错误。

trans-unit.source: The stream does not support seeking, such as if the stream is constructed from a pipe or console output.
trans-unit.target: 流不支持查找，例如在流通过管道或控制台输出构造的情况下即为如此。

trans-unit.source: Methods were called after the stream was closed.
trans-unit.target: 在流关闭后调用方法。

trans-unit.source: The desired length of the current stream in bytes.
trans-unit.target: 所需的当前流的长度（以字节表示）。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, sets the length of the current stream.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写时，设置当前流的长度。

trans-unit.source: If the specified value is less than the current length of the stream, the stream is truncated.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的值小于当前流的长度，则流将被截断。

trans-unit.source: If the specified value is larger than the current length of the stream, the stream is expanded.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的值大于当前流的长度，则流被扩展。

trans-unit.source: If the stream is expanded, the contents of the stream between the old and the new length are not defined.
trans-unit.target: 如果流已展开，未定义旧和新的长度之间流的内容。

trans-unit.source: A stream must support both writing and seeking for `SetLength` to work.
trans-unit.target: 流必须支持写入和查找有关`SetLength`工作。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IO.Stream.CanWrite%2A> property to determine whether the current instance supports writing, and the <xref:System.IO.Stream.CanSeek%2A> property to determine whether seeking is supported.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IO.Stream.CanWrite%2A>属性来确定当前实例是否支持写入，和<xref:System.IO.Stream.CanSeek%2A>属性来确定是否支持查找。

trans-unit.source: An I/O error occurs.
trans-unit.target: 出现 I/O 错误。

trans-unit.source: The stream does not support both writing and seeking, such as if the stream is constructed from a pipe or console output.
trans-unit.target: 流不支持写入和查找，例如在流通过管道或控制台输出构造的情况下即为如此。

trans-unit.source: Methods were called after the stream was closed.
trans-unit.target: 在流关闭后调用方法。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object to synchronize.
trans-unit.target: 要同步的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Creates a thread-safe (synchronized) wrapper around the specified <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 在指定的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 对象周围创建线程安全（同步）包装。

trans-unit.source: A thread-safe <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 一个线程安全的 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a class that wraps the specified <xref:System.IO.Stream> object and restricts access to it from multiple threads.
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回包装指定的类<xref:System.IO.Stream>对象，并限制从多个线程访问它。

trans-unit.source: All access to the <xref:System.IO.Stream> object will be thread safe.
trans-unit.target: 所有访问<xref:System.IO.Stream>对象将是线程安全。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="stream" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="stream" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: An array of bytes.
trans-unit.target: 字节数组。

trans-unit.source: This method copies <c>count</c> bytes from <c>buffer</c> to the current stream.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将 <c>count</c> 个字节从 <c>buffer</c> 复制到当前流。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based byte offset in <c>buffer</c> at which to begin copying bytes to the current stream.
trans-unit.target: <c>buffer</c> 中的从零开始的字节偏移量，从此处开始将字节复制到当前流。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes to be written to the current stream.
trans-unit.target: 要写入当前流的字节数。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, writes a sequence of bytes to the current stream and advances the current position within this stream by the number of bytes written.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写时，向当前流中写入字节序列，并将此流中的当前位置提升写入的字节数。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IO.Stream.CanWrite%2A> property to determine whether the current instance supports writing.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IO.Stream.CanWrite%2A>属性来确定当前实例是否支持写入。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IO.Stream.WriteAsync%2A> method to write asynchronously to the current stream.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IO.Stream.WriteAsync%2A>方法异步写入当前流。

trans-unit.source: If the write operation is successful, the position within the stream advances by the number of bytes written.
trans-unit.target: 如果写入操作成功，将流内的位置向前移动写入的字节数。

trans-unit.source: If an exception occurs, the position within the stream remains unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 如果发生异常，流中的位置将保持不变。

trans-unit.source: The sum of <paramref name="offset" /> and <paramref name="count" /> is greater than the buffer length.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 和 <paramref name="count" /> 的总和大于缓冲区长度。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="buffer" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="buffer" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="offset" /> or <paramref name="count" /> is negative.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 或 <paramref name="count" /> 为负数。

trans-unit.source: An I/O error occured, such as the specified file cannot be found.
trans-unit.target: 发生 I/O 错误，例如找不到指定文件。

trans-unit.source: The stream does not support writing.
trans-unit.target: 流不支持写入。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="M:System.IO.Stream.Write(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)" /> was called after the stream was closed.
trans-unit.target: 在流关闭后调用 <see cref="M:System.IO.Stream.Write(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)" />。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously writes a sequence of bytes to the current stream and advances the current position within this stream by the number of bytes written.
trans-unit.target: 将字节序列异步写入当前流，并将流的当前位置提升写入的字节数。

trans-unit.source: The buffer to write data from.
trans-unit.target: 从中写入数据的缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based byte offset in <c>buffer</c> from which to begin copying bytes to the stream.
trans-unit.target: <c>buffer</c> 中的从零开始的字节偏移量，从此处开始将字节复制到该流。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of bytes to write.
trans-unit.target: 最多写入的字节数。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously writes a sequence of bytes to the current stream and advances the current position within this stream by the number of bytes written.
trans-unit.target: 将字节序列异步写入当前流，并将流的当前位置提升写入的字节数。

trans-unit.source: A task that represents the asynchronous write operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示异步写入操作的任务。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Stream.WriteAsync%2A> method enables you to perform resource-intensive I/O operations without blocking the main thread.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Stream.WriteAsync%2A>方法使您能够在不阻塞主线程的情况下执行占用大量资源的 I/O 操作。

trans-unit.source: This performance consideration is particularly important in a [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] app or [!INCLUDE[desktop_appname](~/includes/desktop-appname-md.md)] app where a time-consuming stream operation can block the UI thread and make your app appear as if it is not working.
trans-unit.target: 在 [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] 应用或 [!INCLUDE[desktop_appname](~/includes/desktop-appname-md.md)] 应用中一个耗时的流操作可能阻塞 UI 线程并让您的应用看起来好像不工作时，这种性能的考虑就显得尤为重要了。

trans-unit.source: The async methods are used in conjunction with the `async` and `await` keywords in Visual Basic and C#.
trans-unit.target: 结合使用异步方法`async`和`await`Visual Basic 和 C# 中的关键字。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IO.Stream.CanWrite%2A> property to determine whether the current instance supports writing.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IO.Stream.CanWrite%2A>属性来确定当前实例是否支持写入。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to write asynchronously to a file.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何以异步方式写入到的文件。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the <xref:System.IO.FileStream> class, which derives from the <xref:System.IO.Stream> class.
trans-unit.target: 该示例使用<xref:System.IO.FileStream>类，该类派生自<xref:System.IO.Stream>类。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="buffer" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="buffer" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="offset" /> or <paramref name="count" /> is negative.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 或 <paramref name="count" /> 为负数。

trans-unit.source: The sum of <paramref name="offset" /> and <paramref name="count" /> is larger than the buffer length.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 和 <paramref name="count" /> 的总和大于缓冲区长度。

trans-unit.source: The stream does not support writing.
trans-unit.target: 流不支持写入。

trans-unit.source: The stream has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 已释放流。

trans-unit.source: The stream is currently in use by a previous write operation.
trans-unit.target: 流正在由前一次写操作使用。

trans-unit.source: The buffer to write data from.
trans-unit.target: 从中写入数据的缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: The zero-based byte offset in <c>buffer</c> from which to begin copying bytes to the stream.
trans-unit.target: <c>buffer</c> 中的从零开始的字节偏移量，从此处开始将字节复制到该流。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of bytes to write.
trans-unit.target: 最多写入的字节数。

trans-unit.source: The token to monitor for cancellation requests.
trans-unit.target: 要监视取消请求的标记。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see cref="P:System.Threading.CancellationToken.None" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see cref="P:System.Threading.CancellationToken.None" />。

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously writes a sequence of bytes to the current stream, advances the current position within this stream by the number of bytes written, and monitors cancellation requests.
trans-unit.target: 将字节的序列异步写入当前流，将该流中的当前位置提升写入的字节数，并监视取消请求。

trans-unit.source: A task that represents the asynchronous write operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示异步写入操作的任务。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Stream.WriteAsync%2A> method enables you to perform resource-intensive I/O operations without blocking the main thread.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Stream.WriteAsync%2A>方法使您能够在不阻塞主线程的情况下执行占用大量资源的 I/O 操作。

trans-unit.source: This performance consideration is particularly important in a [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] app or [!INCLUDE[desktop_appname](~/includes/desktop-appname-md.md)] app where a time-consuming stream operation can block the UI thread and make your app appear as if it is not working.
trans-unit.target: 在 [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] 应用或 [!INCLUDE[desktop_appname](~/includes/desktop-appname-md.md)] 应用中一个耗时的流操作可能阻塞 UI 线程并让您的应用看起来好像不工作时，这种性能的考虑就显得尤为重要了。

trans-unit.source: The async methods are used in conjunction with the `async` and `await` keywords in Visual Basic and C#.
trans-unit.target: 结合使用异步方法`async`和`await`Visual Basic 和 C# 中的关键字。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IO.Stream.CanWrite%2A> property to determine whether the current instance supports writing.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IO.Stream.CanWrite%2A>属性来确定当前实例是否支持写入。

trans-unit.source: If the operation is canceled before it completes, the returned task contains the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled> value for the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Status%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果在完成之前，将取消该操作，返回的任务包含<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus.Canceled>值<xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Status%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: For an example, see the <xref:System.IO.Stream.WriteAsync%28System.Byte%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29> overload.
trans-unit.target: 有关示例，请参阅<xref:System.IO.Stream.WriteAsync%28System.Byte%5B%5D%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>重载。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="buffer" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="buffer" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="offset" /> or <paramref name="count" /> is negative.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 或 <paramref name="count" /> 为负数。

trans-unit.source: The sum of <paramref name="offset" /> and <paramref name="count" /> is larger than the buffer length.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> 和 <paramref name="count" /> 的总和大于缓冲区长度。

trans-unit.source: The stream does not support writing.
trans-unit.target: 流不支持写入。

trans-unit.source: The stream has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 已释放流。

trans-unit.source: The stream is currently in use by a previous write operation.
trans-unit.target: 流正在由前一次写操作使用。

trans-unit.source: The byte to write to the stream.
trans-unit.target: 要写入流中的字节。

trans-unit.source: Writes a byte to the current position in the stream and advances the position within the stream by one byte.
trans-unit.target: 将一个字节写入流内的当前位置，并将流内的位置向前提升一个字节。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IO.Stream.CanWrite%2A> property to determine whether the current instance supports writing.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IO.Stream.CanWrite%2A>属性来确定当前实例是否支持写入。

trans-unit.source: An I/O error occurs.
trans-unit.target: 出现 I/O 错误。

trans-unit.source: The stream does not support writing, or the stream is already closed.
trans-unit.target: 该流不支持写入，或者该流已关闭。

trans-unit.source: Methods were called after the stream was closed.
trans-unit.target: 在流关闭后调用方法。

trans-unit.source: The default implementation on <see langword="Stream" /> creates a new single-byte array and then calls <see cref="M:System.IO.Stream.Write(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)" />.
trans-unit.target: 上的默认实现<see langword="Stream" />创建一个新的单字节数组，然后调用<see cref="M:System.IO.Stream.Write(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)" />。

trans-unit.source: While this is formally correct, it is inefficient.
trans-unit.target: 虽然这是正式正确的效率低。

trans-unit.source: Any stream with an internal buffer should override this method and provide a much more efficient version that writes to the buffer directly, avoiding the extra array allocation on every call.
trans-unit.target: 所有具有内部缓冲区的流应重写此方法，并提供将写入缓冲区直接，避免每次调用的额外的数组分配的高效得多版本。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value, in miliseconds, that determines how long the stream will attempt to write before timing out.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值（以毫秒为单位），该值确定流在超时前尝试写入多长时间。

trans-unit.source: A value, in miliseconds, that determines how long the stream will attempt to write before timing out.
trans-unit.target: 一个确定流在超时前尝试写入多长时间的值（以毫秒为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.IO.Stream.WriteTimeout" /> method always throws an <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.IO.Stream.WriteTimeout" /> 方法总是引发 <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.IO.Stream.WriteTimeout" /> property should be overridden to provide the appropriate behavior for the stream.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.IO.Stream.WriteTimeout" />应重写属性，以便为流提供的适当行为。

trans-unit.source: If the stream does not support timing out, this property should raise an <see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" />.
trans-unit.target: 流不支持超时，如果此属性应引发<see cref="T:System.InvalidOperationException" />。
